import numpy as np 
import pandas as pd 
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
import requests
import json
source.f033919c:
try:
    url = 'https://www.mygov.in/sites/default/files/covid/covid_state_counts_ver1.json'
    covid_data = requests.get(url)
    soup = BeautifulSoup(covid_data.content,"html.parser")
    txt = soup.get_text()
    data = json.loads(txt)
    states = list(data.get('Name of State / UT').values())
    total_confirmed_cases = list(data.get("Total Confirmed cases").values())
    active_cases = list(data.get("Active").values())
    cured_discharged_migrated = list(data.get("Cured/Discharged/Migrated").values())
    death = list(data.get("Death").values())
    date = data.get('as_on')
    statevise_covid_cases = pd.DataFrame({'States': states,
                  'Total_Confirmed_Cases': total_confirmed_cases,
                  'Active_Cases': active_cases,
                  'Cured_Discharged_Migrated': cured_discharged_migrated,
                  'Death': death,
                  'Date' : date})
    statevise_covid_cases.to_csv('India_covid19_cases.csv',index=False)
except:
    print("Code not working...")

try:
    url = 'https://www.mygov.in/sites/default/files/covid/vaccine/covid_vaccine_timeline.json'
    vaccination_data = requests.get(url)
    soup = BeautifulSoup(vaccination_data.content,"html.parser")
    txt = soup.get_text()
    data = json.loads(txt)
    vaccine_data = data.get("vaccine_data")
    df = pd.DataFrame(vaccine_data)
    df.drop(['vacc_st_data'],axis=1,inplace=True)
    df.to_csv('India_vaccination_data.csv',index=False)
except:
    print("Code not working...")
